content.en: Power quality optimization: Researchers have investigated the effectiveness of different control algorithms in improving the performance of a device called DSTATCOM, which is used to compensate for power quality issues in electrical systems. These algorithms, such as Adaline-based control and Enhanced phase-locked loop (EPLL) scheme, attribute agency to the algorithms in achieving tasks like reactive power compensation, load balancing, harmonics elimination, and power factor correction. The studies aim to enhance the capabilities of DSTATCOM in mitigating voltage sag, reducing losses, and improving power quality under various grid and load conditions.
content.da: Optimering af strømkvalitet: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af forskellige kontrolalgoritmer i at forbedre ydeevnen af en enhed kaldet DSTATCOM, som bruges til at kompensere for problemer med strømkvalitet i elektriske systemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Adaline-baseret kontrol og forbedret fase-låst loop (EPLL) skema, tilskriver algoritmerne agenturet til at udføre opgaver som reaktiv effektkompensering, belastningsbalancering, eliminering af harmoniske forstyrrelser og forbedring af effektfaktoren. Studierne sigter mod at forbedre DSTATCOM's kapaciteter i at afhjælpe spændingsdyk, reducere tab og forbedre strømkvaliteten under forskellige net- og belastningsforhold.
